title: 91. Rebecca Zahau and Max Shacknai - The Mansion Curse
description:
On this episode of MWMH, Payton and Garrett discuss the mysterious deaths of Rebecca Zahau and 8-year-old Max Shacknai in the Spreckles Mansion.

Case Sources:

ABC 20/20
